[img]http://i.imgur.com/5xAFYh1.png[/img]

[font=Tahoma][b]※1.0[/b]
[/font]Initial Release

[b]※1.1[/b]
*Common)
 - Appearance Modifed:Nose,Mouth
 - Add Bodyset:UNP Bless Body

*Agness)
 - AI Added:
a.m 8:00~p.m 12:00 : Grey Quarter -> Docks -> Grey Quarter -> Aretino's House -> Marketplace -> Residence around Hjerim
p.m 12:00~p.m 13:00 : New Gnesis Cornerclub
p.m 13:00~p.m 18:00 : Grey Quarter -> Docks -> Grey Quarter -> Aretino's House -> Marketplace -> Residence around Hjerim
p.m 18:00~p.m 21:00 : Candlehearth Hall
p.m 21:00~p.m 22:00 : Temple of Talos
p.m 22:00~p.m 23:00 : Palace of the Kings
p.m 23:00~a.m 8:00 : Windhelm Barracks

※1.2)
*Common)
 - Appearance Modifed
 - Agatha:Hair,Eyes and Eyebrows
 - Agness:Eyes and Eyebrows


[img]http://i.imgur.com/yQkrKI8.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5xAFYh1.png[/img]

[font=Tahoma][size=3]Date)[/size]
*Create:2017.03.08
*Complete:2017.03.10
*Upload:2017.03.12
*Update to 1.1:2017.03.14
*Required:No


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/jTRUbhA.jpg?1[/img][/center]
[b][size=4]<Agatha>[/size][/b]

[b][size=3]Character Info)[/size][/b]
*Adress:Riverwood
*Affiliation:Companions -> Whiterun Guard -> Solitude Guard -> Imperial Soldier
*Birth:4E 175 (27 Years)
*Race:Nord
*Voice:Female Commander
*Combat:One-Hand(Single-Wield,Dual-Wield),Block
*Marriage:Yes
*Location:Solitude Castle Dour

[b][size=3]Credits)[/size][/b]
*Hair:KS Hairdos Renewal [/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/][font=Tahoma]Link[/font][/url]
[font=Tahoma]*Eyes:Eyes of Beauty [/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/][font=Tahoma]Link[/font][/url]
[font=Tahoma]*Brows:included in :Calientes Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- [/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/][font=Tahoma]Link[/font][/url]

[font=Tahoma]*Body:
Calientes Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- [/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/][font=Tahoma]Link[/font][/url]

[/font]*Making System:Enhanced Character Edit [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951]Link[/url][/font][size=4][b]


[center][font=Tahoma][img]http://i.imgur.com/QnHu7Jr.jpg?1[/img][/font][/center]
[font=Tahoma]<Agness>[/font][/b][/size]

[font=Tahoma][b][size=3]Character Info)[/size][/b]
*Adress:Riverwood
*Affiliation:Companions -> Whiterun Guard -> Windhelm Guard
*Birth:4E 177 (25 Years)
*Race:Nord
*Voice:Female Even toned
*Combat:One-Hand(Single-Wield,Dual-Wield),Two-Hand(Great Sword,Battle Axe,Battle Hammer)
*Marriage:Yes
*Location:Windhelm Palace of thd Kings

[b][size=3]Credits)[/size][/b]
*Hair:SG Hair Pack 268 [s]Link[/s]
*Eyes:Eyes of Beauty [/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/][font=Tahoma]Link[/font][/url]
[font=Tahoma]*Brows:Numenume Female Brows MARO Sono 2 [/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7625/][font=Tahoma]Link[/font][/url]
[font=Tahoma]*Skin:Fair Skin Complexion [/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/][font=Tahoma]Link[/font][/url]
[font=Tahoma]*Body:
Calientes Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- [/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/][font=Tahoma]Link[/font][/url]
[font=Tahoma][font=Tahoma]UNP BLESSED BODY- UNPB REDUX PROJECT [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900]Link[/url][/font]
*Making System:Enhanced Character Edit [/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/][font=Tahoma]Link[/font][/url]


[font=Tahoma][b][size=3]Using Mods in Screenshot)[/size][/b]
*ENB:Snapdragon Prime ENB Lite 2x [url=http://cafe.naver.com/elderscrolls7/824896]Link[/url]
*Lights:Enhanced Lights and FX [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/]Link[/url]
*Lights:Enhanced Light for ENB -LITE- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59733/]Link[/url]
*Armor:Bless Armors Pack by s666 Retouched [url=http://regenbot.tistory.com/66]Link[/url]
*Armor:Bless RB0007 Armor [s]Link[/s]
*Follower:MBWS Amalia Custom Voice Follower [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58460/]Link[/url]
[font=Tahoma]*Follower:Masyamune Follower [url=http://0ri-suzuka.tumblr.com/post/135041842598/masyamune-follower-mod-20151212]Link[/url][/font]
*Character Retex:Males of Skyrim [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61937/]Link[/url]
*Character Retex:Rikke in Bijin NPCs [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71054/]Link[/url]
*Character Retex:Sidearm's NPC85 Series [url=http://blog.naver.com/sidearmf93/90191005821]Link[/url]
[/font]
